title: "Sona's harassment is uncounterable"
body:
Sona's Q range - 850, AA range - 550 (note that her harassment is crap without empowered AA's)

Leona's Zenith Blade - 875
Nami's bubble - 875, Ebb and Flow - 725
Jinx' lv1 rocket attack - 600
Zyra's Grasping Roots - 1100
Cait's Q - 1300, AA - 650
Corki's Q - 825
Vayne's tumble (300 units) + AA - 550
Graves' Q - 950
Sivir's Q - 1250
Kog's AA with lv1 W - 630
Varus' Q- 925-1387, E 925
Karma's tether - 675
Lulu's Q - 925, W and E - 700
Zilean's bomb - 700
Draven's E - 1050

Including things that don't pass through minions, but spell instant death for Sona due to how squishy and defenseless she is:
Thresh's hook - 1100
Blitz's hook - 925
Morg's binding - 1175

Yeah, it's totally oppressive and uncounterable outside of staying out of range. Not like you have your own abilities and attacks that outrange and outdamage her if she gets close enough.

EDIT: How comes that I never see people complaining about undodgeable Sona's Q complain about ranged top laners? Seeing that, unlike in bot lane, melee toplaners more often than not don't have a ranged ability to retaliate against that Vayne or Quinn who just AA them for free damage.
